overview: Summer Solstice at Glastonbury Tor in Somerset, a location central  to the spiritual and mythological landscape of England. Shot in 2019,  a year in which national divides were embellished by populist rhetoric  surrounding the countryâ€™s exit from the EU, the film acts as an alternative catalyst to reflect on dialogues surrounding English nationalism,  identity and Romanticism.
title: A Thin Place
